mutants.original_line: crashers_set = {guest for inviter, invited_list in invitations for guest in [inviter] + invited_list}
mutants.mutated_line: crashers_set = {guest for (inviter, invited_list) in invitations for guest in [inviter] - invited_list}

mutants.original_line: crashers_set = {guest for inviter, invited_list in invitations for guest in [inviter] + invited_list}
mutants.mutated_line: crashers_set = {guest for (inviter, invited_list) in invitations for guest in [inviter] * invited_list}

mutants.original_line: gatecrashers = [member for member in party_members if member not in crashers_set]
mutants.mutated_line: gatecrashers = [member for member in party_members if member in crashers_set]
